caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. GERALD LACK,

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Judgment unanimously affirmed. Counsel's motion to be relieved of assignment granted (see People v. Crawford, 71 A.D.2d 38).
